1.title: Jerome Robbins' Broadway Part 1
1.plot: Sirius/XM Radio personality Julie James discusses one of Broadway's most prolific geniuses, Jerome Robbins, with members of the original cast of his smash hit '89 musical revue.

2.title: Jerome Robbins' Broadway Part 2
2.plot: Sirius/XM Radio personality Julie James discusses one of Broadway's most prolific geniuses, Jerome Robbins, with members of the original cast of his smash hit '89 musical revue.

imdb.plot outline: Come backstage as the cast and creatives of beloved Broadway productions reunite to share their personal stories from some of the most celebrated shows in Broadway history. Take a peek behind the curtain as journey through auditions, rehearsals, opening and closing nights, and of course the Tony Awards! Relive the magic of your favorite shows with the people who made them possible!
imdb.title: Fan Fare
plot: From the first audition to the Tony _Awards_ (qv), only _Fan Fare_ (qv) has the insider story from the people who lived it as casts and creatives from iconic Broadway shows reunite at the iconic Sardi's restaurant.::Stage17

Come backstage as the cast and creatives of beloved Broadway productions reunite to share their personal stories from some of the most celebrated shows in Broadway history. Take a peek behind the curtain as journey through auditions, rehearsals, opening and closing nights, and of course the Tony _Awards_ (qv)! Relive the magic of your favorite shows with the people who made them possible!::Stage17
